rows.text: You are doing amazing, keep up the good work.

text.eng: You are doing amazing, keep up the good work.

rows.text: Your teen is so lucky to have you as a parent.

text.eng: Your teen is so lucky to have you as a parent.

rows.text: Parenting can be hard, but @global.parent_app is here to help you win.

text.eng: Parenting can be hard, but @global.parent_app is here to help you win.

rows.text: Spending 1 minute learning about parenting makes a world of difference.

text.eng: Spending 1 minute learning about parenting makes a world of difference.
